name: py-cachecontrol

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
CacheControl is a port of the caching algorithms in httplib2 for use
with requests session object.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-lockfile
dependencies.description:
The lockfile package exports a LockFile class which provides a simple
API for locking files. Unlike the Windows msvcrt.locking function, the
fcntl.lockf and flock functions, and the deprecated posixfile module,
the API is identical across both Unix (including Linux and Mac) and
Windows platforms. The lock mechanism relies on the atomic nature of the
link (on Unix) and mkdir (on Windows) system calls. An implementation
based on SQLite is also provided, more as a demonstration of the
possibilities it provides than as production-quality code.

dependent_to.name: py-cwl-utils
dependent_to.description:
Python Utilities and Autogenerated Classes for loading and parsing CWL
v1.0, CWL v1.1, and CWL v1.2 documents.
